findings.title: Owner can pause/unpause contract
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to pause or unpause the contract.

findings.title: Owner can renounce ownership
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to renounce their ownership.

findings.title: Owner can transfer ownership
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to transfer ownership.

findings.title: Owner can change sale times
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to modify sale times.

findings.title: Owner can start claim time
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the ability to start the claim time, which may lead to potential security risks if not properly validated.

findings.title: Owner can change claim start time
findings.description: The contract owner has the ability to modify the claim start time.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn tokens
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to burn tokens.

findings.title: Owner cannot block user
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to block a specific user.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.
